name: Infinite Corridor (velotgames)
description:
Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move

E or SPACE to pick up or place orbs

ESC to start over

Welcome to the Infinite Corridor!

Five runes are scattered about an endless maze.

Place each color orb on its matching rune to find the exit.

You can only hold one orb at a time. 

Be careful! One of the rooms contains a hidden teleporter that will transfer you to a random location.

You can make a map, but can you trust it?

(You might recognize the objectives from a certain minigame...)

Good luck!

 For a challenge, try to escape in the fewest moves!
